entry.title: $2300 // The coolest building I've ever seen! Tons of amenities!
entry.content:
INTRODUCING A GORGEOUS ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT IN A TRUE TROPHY BUILDING IN THE HOTTEST PART OF BED-STUY!!!!


THE KITCHEN
The kitchen in this apartment has gorgeous white marble countertops with plenty of counter space! The appliances are camouflage and second to none. There is even a DISHWASHER making clean up sooo easy! There is also plenty of cabinet space for anything you might night to store away. There is also a state of the art VIRTUAL DOORMAN to know who is ringing your bell and saving time.

THE LIVING ROOM
The living room is spacious and has plenty of natural sunlight. Lets not forget the hardwood floors giving it that elegant look!

THE BEDROOM
There is a spacious QUEEN sized bedroom with TONZZZ of natural sunlight. Gorgeous hard wood floors with an elegant finish.

THE BATHROOM
The bathroom has stunning tiles. We made sure to put in the most modern tiles, to give the bathroom the best look possible! The Shower head is state of the art waterfall showers making you look forward to showering after an exhausting day.

ABOUT THE BUILDING
This building is modernly designed. For your convenience, we put a LAUNDRY ROOM in the basement so that laundry can be taken care of with ease! There is also a state of the art GYM for all the tenants to use freely. There is also a GORGEOUS shared ROOF DECK with an INCREDIBLE VIEW of the MANHATTAN SKYLINE!!! This ROOF DECK is PERFECT to RELAX after a long day of work!!!

THE NEIGHBORHOOD
This GORGEOUS building is right near tons of nice restaurants, shops, grocery stores, bars and much more!
The building is also right by the A and C trains; a ride to Manhattan or anywhere in town you need to get in just minutes!


***PETS ALLOWED***
***NO FEE***
***GUARANTORS WELCOME***

Call, text or email Joseph: show contact info

Virtual Doorman
Fully modern tiled bathroom with a TUB
Tons of natural sun light
Hardwood floors throughout the apartment!

*Heat and Hot Water Included*

Right near tons of nice restaurants, shops, grocery stores, bars and much more!

Right by the A and C trains; a ride to Manhattan in minutes!
